title: How to Catch Missingno. in Pokémon Red and Blue

steps.title: Make sure that your character's name is "ASH" without the quotation marks.
steps.content: Make sure that your character's name is "ASH" without the quotation marks. Catching Missingno. depends on having certain letters in your name, and ASH is the easiest.

steps.title: Go to Viridian City and talk to the old man located in the north.
steps.content: Go to Viridian City and talk to the old man located in the north. When he asks if you are in a hurry, say "No".

steps.title: Watch the video the man shows you.
steps.content: Watch the video the man shows you. The man will show you a video on how to catch Pokémon. After watching the demonstration, immediately Fly to Cinnabar Island. Flying to Fuchsia City also works.

steps.title: Surf to the east coast of Cinnabar Island.
steps.content: Surf to the east coast of Cinnabar Island. Or, if you flew to Fuchsia City, surf south and west until you get to the Seafoam Islands.

steps.title: Surf along the coastlines once you get to the Cinnabar Island.
steps.content: Surf along the coastlines once you get to the Cinnabar Island.

steps.title: After a while, you'll encounter Missingno.
steps.content: After a while, you'll encounter Missingno. You may also see 'M, which works just as well.
